goal.ch: 經由授課和實驗了解控制理論
goal.en:
Continuous/discrete system model
Laplace transform
Block diagram/Signal flow
Trainsient/Steady state responses
Analysis/Design via time domain
Analysis/Design via frequency domain
MATLAB coding

outline.ch:
“Prerequisites: Calculus, Physics, Mathematics
Engineering and Circuits
Objectives: Fundamentals of Automatic Control“

textbook.ch:
“課本: Automatic Control Systems - Golnaraghi and Kuo - 10e
參考書目: (1) aThinking in Control with Matlab, J. C. Lo, ISBN-978-957-41-8721-8; (2) Feedback control of dynamic systems - Franklin, Powell, Emami-Naeini, and Powell (3) Control Systems Engineering - N.S. Nise; (4) Modern Control Systems - R.C. Dorf“
